definition: Wang Nan (1978-), female PRC table tennis player, Olympic medalist
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
surname Wang
to rule/to reign over
Machilus nanmu/Chinese cedar/Chinese giant redwood

sentences.english: Wang Nan is the best in the world.
sentences.chinese: 王楠是世界上最優秀的運動員之一。

sentences.english: Wang Nan is one of the best altheletes in the world.
sentences.chinese: 王楠是世界上最優秀的運動員之一。

sentences.english: Wang Nan is a ping pong player. She's pretty. I think she likes to swim.
sentences.chinese: 是校際乒乓球冠軍，她當然選擇了王楠。

sentences.english: I'm wangNana student of No. 1 Middle School.
sentences.chinese: 我王楠，一中的一名學生。

sentences.english: Wang Nan had beaten that German player when I arrived / got there. 2.
sentences.chinese: 當我到達時王楠已經擊敗了那個德國選手。

sentences.english: My roommate Wang Nan is very snobbish.
sentences.chinese: 我的室友王楠非常勢利。

sentences.english: Wang Nan was the No. 1 seed in the table-tennis championship.
sentences.chinese: 王楠是這次乒乓球錦標賽中的第一號種子選手。

sentences.english: As for what gift to Wang Nan , Zhang Yining not think good.
sentences.chinese: 至於送給王楠什麼禮物，張怡寧還沒有想好。

sentences.english: Prof. Nanlin Wang and Prof. Fa wang are both corresponding authors of this paper.
sentences.chinese: 王楠林教授和王垡教授是該文章的共同通訊作者。

sentences.english: Now she will be the new table tennis queen after Wang Nan's retirement.
sentences.chinese: 繼王楠退役，現在她將成爲新的乒壇王后。
